tasks.desc: Create comprehensive exploitation module with modern exploit techniques
Implement advanced post-exploitation framework with lateral movement capabilities
Develop memory manipulation module for process injection and DLL hijacking
Create EDR evasion module with anti-forensic capabilities
Implement wireless attack module for various protocols (WiFi, Bluetooth, ZigBee)
Add web application security testing with advanced XSS/SQLi/SSRF capabilities
Create hardware interface module for embedded device analysis
Add AI-powered vulnerability discovery and exploitation suggestions
